languages.text: {n}На языке возникает привкус желчи во рту, и вы отворачиваетесь, чтобы не последовать примеру Кляйна.{/n}
{n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На языке возникает привкус желчи во рту, и вы отворачиваетесь, чтобы не последовать примеру Кляйна.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You suddenly taste bile in your mouth and are forced to look away so as not to follow Klein's example.{/n}
{n}You suddenly taste bile in your mouth and are forced to look away so as not to follow Klein's example.{/n}
{n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

{n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subitement, le goût de la bile vous remonte dans la gorge et vous êtes {mf|contraint|contrainte} de détourner le regard sous peine de suivre l'exemple de Klein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Subitement, le goût de la bile vous remonte dans la gorge et vous êtes {mf|contraint|contrainte} de détourner le regard sous peine de suivre l'exemple de Klein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De pronto, el sabor de la bilis llena tu boca y te ves obligad{mf|o|a} a apartar la vista para no seguir los pasos de Klein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto, el sabor de la bilis llena tu boca y te ves obligad{mf|o|a} a apartar la vista para no seguir los pasos de Klein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，你感觉嘴里泛起了胆汁的味道。你不得不赶紧移开视线，以免重蹈克莱因的覆辙。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，你感觉嘴里泛起了胆汁的味道。你不得不赶紧移开视线，以免重蹈克莱因的覆辙。{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然、胆汁の味が口の中にこみ上げてきて、クラインのように吐き出さないように、仕方なく目をそむけた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、胆汁の味が口の中にこみ上げてきて、クラインのように吐き出さないように、仕方なく目をそむけた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich steigt dir der Geschmack von Galle in den Mund und du bist gezwungen, wegzusehen, um es Klein nicht gleichzutun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich steigt dir der Geschmack von Galle in den Mund und du bist gezwungen, wegzusehen, um es Klein nicht gleichzutun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aniden ağzına safranın acı tadı geliyor. Klein'ın izinden gitmemek adına bakışlarını kaçırmak zorunda kalıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the taste of bile rises in your mouth, and you are forced to look away, lest you follow Klein's example.{/n}
